item.title: DaemonSet
item.description: A DaemonSet ensures that all (or some) Nodes run a copy of a Pod. As nodes are added to the cluster, Pods are added to them. As nodes are removed from the cluster, those Pods are garbage collected. Deleting a DaemonSet will clean up the Pods it created. Lets imagine that we need an agent deployed on all nodes which reads the system logs and sent to a log analysis database
